net.bytebuddy.agent.builder

接口 AgentBuilder.Transformer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AgentBuilder.Transformer.Compound, AgentBuilder.Transformer.ForAdvice, AgentBuilder.Transformer.ForBuildPlugin, AgentBuilder.Transformer.NoOp
    封闭接口:
    AgentBuilder

    public static interface AgentBuilder.Transformer
    A transformer allows to apply modifications to a DynamicType. Such a modification is then applied to any instrumented type that was matched by the preceding matcher.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  AgentBuilder.Transformer.Compound
      A compound transformer that allows to group several AgentBuilder.Transformers as a single transformer.
      static class  AgentBuilder.Transformer.ForAdvice
      A transformer for applying an Advice where this advice class might reference types of both the agent's and the user's class loader.
      static class  AgentBuilder.Transformer.ForBuildPlugin
      A transformer that applies a build Plugin.
      static class  AgentBuilder.Transformer.NoOp
      A no-op implementation of a AgentBuilder.Transformer that does not modify the supplied dynamic type.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DynamicType.Builder<?> transform(DynamicType.Builder<?> builder, TypeDescription typeDescription, ClassLoader classLoader, JavaModule module)
      Allows for a transformation of a DynamicType.Builder.

    • 方法详细资料

      • transform

        DynamicType.Builder<?> transform(DynamicType.Builder<?> builder,
                                 TypeDescription typeDescription,
                                 ClassLoader classLoader,
                                 JavaModule module)
        Allows for a transformation of a DynamicType.Builder.
        参数:
        builder - The dynamic builder to transform.
        typeDescription - The description of the type currently being instrumented.
        classLoader - The class loader of the instrumented class. Might be null to represent the bootstrap class loader.
        module - The class's module or null if the current VM does not support modules.
        返回:
        A transformed version of the supplied builder.
